ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | uc1pcl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | uc1pcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 3 |  | mon1pcl.m | |- M = ( Monic1p ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` P ) = ( 0g ` P ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg1 ` R ) = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 4, 5, 3, 6 | #P_ismon1p | |- ( F e. M <-> ( F e. B /\ F =/= ( 0g ` P ) /\ ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` ( ( deg1 ` R ) ` F ) ) = ( 1r ` R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simp1bi | |- ( F e. M -> F e. B ) |
